description:
Ajimu Yasuna, the eponymous character, lived in Tokyo until a few months before the beginning of this story but now attends the same high school as http://anidb.net/ch26382 [Suzue]. She likes music, history and the Japanese language, all of which results in her composing and playing her own songs: As a side job she plays Hawaiian music on her ukulele twice a week in the bar http://anidb.net/ch26470 [J.O.D.].
When she meets http://anidb.net/ch26379 [Hirosuke] the first time she mistakes him for a molester first, then considers him a stalker when the boy desperately tries to clear up the misunderstanding, before they eventually form a friendship. But Yasuna hasn`t moved on after http://anidb.net/ch26448 [learning] about the death of her former boyfriend http://anidb.net/ch26383 [Otomine Yuuma].
name: Ajimu Yasuna
